column4: I need some help to get my DvD menues to work, i have tried what i think is everything =)
do you have libdvdcss2 installed?
i think so, im not sure :S
check :)
I had css2 but not livdvdcss2-dev
try them both then restart
I had the same problems and I installed those then restarted and it worked
Il try to install both, Then il come back to ya =) thanx for helping
that do it?
im on it right now..just had to find something to check with =)
it works with a dvd that is on a disc, will try on something that is a .iso or .img file and see how that works..thanx =)
great
darn! It works fine on a dvd that is on a disk, not if played from harddrive
hm
funo how to fix that one :(
!dvd
it works for you with menues when you play from harddrive?
did you burn a iso ?
yes, and that worked..The thing is that i do not burn so much stuff, i rather play it direktly
I understand
may have to ask someone else about that
